Articles.Content:
ok, so i have the zip installation extracted to my desktop:

C:\Users\Me\Desktop\KSP_win

it works and launches 1.1.3

i want to play 1.2 so i got the patcher and put it in the folder, when it asks for the ksp folder i put that ^ but its saying its not  where ksp is installed.

what path is it? i cant find anything for squad/ksp in program files.

Did you buy it via steam? 

If so, go to ProgramFiles(x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/Kerbal Space Program

I'm having a similar issue. I update the game via the launcher, and it updated to 1.1.3. The updater insists that patch files were unable to be synced, I'm guessing the ones pertaining to 1.2. I have tried removing the mods I had, to no effect.

On 03/10/2016 at 3:13 AM, 1wsx10 said:

ok, so i have the zip installation extracted to my desktop:

C:\Users\Me\Desktop\KSP_win

it works and launches 1.1.3

i want to play 1.2 so i got the patcher and put it in the folder, when it asks for the ksp folder i put that ^ but its saying its not  where ksp is installed.

what path is it? i cant find anything for squad/ksp in program files.

Please do not use the patcher, it is no longer maintained or supported, instead you will need to use the patches from your store account downloads page or a full install.
